message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm! While I'm interested in the product, I'm hoping to get it for a little less. How about $105?  I think that's fair for both of us.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! However, I've got to make a profit on this one. I can do $108, and that's as low as I can go.
